executionPlan.name: GradientOfRequestsInFlightFinder
executionPlan.description: This will find the gradient of the number of requests in flight over a minute.
executionPlan.queryExpressions: from lbStats2#window.stratos:gradient(1 min, in_flight_requests) select cluster_id,partition_id,in_flight_requests as count group by cluster_id,partition_id insert into gradient_in_flight_requests;
